posts.com:
>>23860686
I had good results trading oil with 10% leverage.
my rules: not more than 8% of trading portfolio in a single position (still aggressive). Using basic support and resistance. Mental stop losses.

But keep in mind I was already somewhat experienced in trading after trading crypto with leverage on bitmex for 2 years and losing everything.

And besides, I believe the safer option for you would be looking for uniswap shitcoin gems and flipping them early for profit. It's safer than leverage because you won't get liquidated (though the shitcoin may die)
